main event: A farmer spotted a glowing, cigar-shaped object near his farm in 1959.
interesting points: The object appeared to change in size and color, from bright white to orange.
The object hovered in one position for about 5 minutes before moving slowly and disappearing.
The object made no noise and had a metallic or aluminum-like finish.
The object was observed at an altitude of 1000-2000 feet and at a distance of 1/2 mile from the witnesses.
No other witnesses could confirm the report, and no physical evidence was found at the site.
sighted object: a cigar-shaped, metallic object that changed in size and color
